attributes.action: Open vote in the House of Commons to serve Article 50 on the EU
attributes.background:
We elected the Government to make key decisions on our behalf & not to abdicate responsibility by holding a referendum. 

This vote in the HoC would allow our elected MPs a last chance to keep the UK in the EU or finally provide a mandate to leave.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
